Backup YouTube Liked Videos with youtube-dl

  1. Start by installing the latest version of youtube-dl with the following commands

    sudo curl -L https://yt-dl.org/downloads/latest/youtube-dl -o /usr/local/bin/youtube-dl
sudo chmod a+rx /usr/local/bin/youtube-dl

    If the last step doesn't work, you might have to install python2.7

    sudo apt install python

  2. Dump your cookies into a file youtube-dl can understand so it can authenticate with YouTube using cookies.txt for Firefox or cookies.txt for Chrome

  3. Make sure you are in the folder you want to save the videos into and then run the following command

    youtube-dl --cookies /path/to/cookies.txt --download-archive archive.txt --ignore-errors --yes-playlist [Link to your Liked Vidoes playlist]
